column1: Kata Robata////From the suggestion of a friend of a friend and also needing a "new" sushi place to try in our neighborhood
column2: we were glad that we were able to get right in...on a Friday night!  Not to say it was not busy because I am pretty sure we got the last open table.  Despite the strip mall location on a tired and construction heavy Richmond and Kirby
column3: the ambiance inside is very warm
column5: and about as hip interior design that reminds me of the restaurant "Fix" at the Bellagio in Vegas....
